game.boardGame

Class BoardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.boardGame.BoardGame

  • public class BoardGame
extends java.lang.Object
    BoardGame contain an ArrayList of all the cells It initialize, generate random stuffs & enemies and populate the cells This Class is handled by Game
    Author:
    Tarik
    See Also:
    Game

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardGame()
      Constructor of BoardGame Initialize : numberOfCells = total number of cells boardGame = Arraylist which will store all Cells

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItemInBoardGame(int numberOfCellsToCreate, java.util.ArrayList<Cell> boardGame, java.lang.String typeOfCell)
      Thanks to Reflection : I retrieve the instance of the typeOfCell which is a string (weapons, enemies, healthPotions...)
      void cellContent(java.lang.String level)
      cellContent will initialize the first cell to null and call the method addItemInBoardGame to populate the ArrayList.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> generateRandomCells(java.lang.String level)
      Depending with the level given, this method will return an HashMap.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardGame

        public BoardGame()
        Constructor of BoardGame Initialize : numberOfCells = total number of cells boardGame = Arraylist which will store all Cells

    • Method Detail

      • addItemInBoardGame

        public void addItemInBoardGame(int numberOfCellsToCreate,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Cell> boardGame,
                               java.lang.String typeOfCell)
        Thanks to Reflection : I retrieve the instance of the typeOfCell which is a string (weapons, enemies, healthPotions...) I Cast this instance to store it in the ArrayList Cell
        Parameters:
        numberOfCellsToCreate - int Number of items / enemies to populate inside the ArrayList
        boardGame - ArrayList Object which will store all items / enemies
        typeOfCell - String Which type of cell will populate the ArrayList

      • cellContent

        public void cellContent(java.lang.String level)
        cellContent will initialize the first cell to null and call the method addItemInBoardGame to populate the ArrayList. generateRandomCells(String) addItemInBoardGame(int, ArrayList, String)
        Parameters:
        level - String level of the game (Easy, medium, hard)

      • generateRandomCells

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> generateRandomCells(java.lang.String level)
        Depending with the level given, this method will return an HashMap. This HashMap can used with get() method to retrieve how many item to create
        Parameters:
        level - String
        Returns:
        HashMap Of String and Integer String represent the name of the item / enemy Integer represent the number of item / enemy to create

      • getNumberOfCells

        public int getNumberOfCells()

      • getBoardGame

        public java.util.List<Cell> getBoardGame()
